title: Stock Savvy
description: Empower your stock market decisions with StockSavvy, a comprehensive web application offering essential tools for tracking and analyzing key stock information. Stay informed and make informed investment choices with ease.
alt: landing page of a stocks website

title: Manga Website
description: Embark on a journey through our manga website, where vibrant worlds and compelling characters await. Discover new series, immerse yourself in the art of storytelling, and explore captivating narratives.
alt: image of a comic book reading website

title: Ski Weather
description: Plan your perfect ski adventure with our resort weather checker. Stay updated on current conditions, snowfall forecasts, and temperature trends to make the most of your time on the slopes.
alt: image of a ski resort weather checking site

title: Banking
description: Manage your finances securely with our comprehensive banking site. Access accounts, transfer funds, and explore financial services tailored to your needs, ensuring seamless banking experiences at your fingertips.

title: Careerway Commute
description: Navigate your career journey with CareerWay Commute. Simplify job searches and commute planning. Explore opportunities, streamline your route, and embark on a smoother path to professional success.
alt: image of the landing page of a job search & commute website

title: Ecommerce
description: Revamp your wardrobe with our trendy ecommerce clothing site. Browse stylish collections, shop the latest fashion trends, and elevate your style with ease and convenience from our online store.
alt: image of the landing page of a clothing website
